video_title: How To Deal With Passive Aggressive Communication
transcript:
is everything okay yeah I'm fine
okay
are you sure everything's okay
I'm fine
so I'm noticing by your body language
that you're clearly upset and when I ask
you if you're upset you're giving me a
different communication and telling me
that you're fine
I'm going to go by your word and assume
that you really are fine
okay if you do have an issue I'm really
open to talking about it
I've noticed a pattern where you
struggle with directly talking about how
you feel and on my end it feels like I
have to pull it out of you this feels
really draining for me and I want a
relationship where we can directly tell
each other what's going on and tell each
other what it is that we need
